beer.beer_description:
Happy Hops was originally brewed by the Grace Brothers Brewery in 1944 right here in Santa Rosa! Their brewery went out of business in the 1960s, but we wanted to resurrect “Happy” (the hop on the logo) and create a new fun beer for him to enjoy! It is also a way for us to pay homage to the Grace Family and their beer pioneering history. Happy Hops is an incredibly hoppy India Pale Ale with an immense hop aroma and flavor and a mild bitterness.

Intense citrus flavor and aroma with pronounced grapefruit characteristics. Mildly bitter with aromas of blueberry, mango, and other tropical fruits. The hop-forward character of this beer type is often referred to as “juicy.”

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 60 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 13!

items.badge_description:
Start the season off right with your friends from Punch Cigars! Get to know the Official Cigar of Beer Lovers a little better here: www.punchcigars.com.
For sale in the U.S. only.

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 115 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 24! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
